resources.string: We got something to ask you…
Flyer uses notifications to update you on your file transfer progress. If you choose to not receive notifications, you can still enable them later in your device\'s settings.
This device is now visible to all devices connected to the same WiFi network as you.
Received files will be stored in the Downloads folder.
Make sure the receiving device is connected to the same WiFi network as you.
You are connected to a WiFi network and have your hotspot enabled at the same time. Flyer will search for devices in the external WiFi network.
The device can\'t receive any file at the moment.
We need permission from you to save received files in your download folder (plis don\'t click don\'t ask again).
